title: Gyouten Ningen Batsealer
original_name: 仰天人間バトシーラー
opening_song: #1: "Let's Sail! Batsealer (レッツセイル!バトシーラー)" by Aya Nozawa (野沢あや)
ending_song: #1: "Mahou no Kotoba (まほうのことば)" by Masumi Itou (伊藤真澄)
sinopse: With the ability to transcend time, Captain Fatz and comrades embarked on a journey of battle and adventure to gather the eight scattered stone pieces (namely Light, Darkness, Fire, Water, Air, Earth, Wood & Metal) which was granulated by the lord of destruction, in order to restore the chaotic world back to peace.
